name: Recipe: Satisfying Salad
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Satisfying Salad.

value.name: Cabbage
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Apple
value.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

value.name: Bird Egg
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Potato
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Satisfying Salad
value.desc: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.

value.name: Mona
value.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

value.name: Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)
value.desc: Mona's specialty. A great work from a great astrologer. Its greatest aspect lies with its cost-effectiveness in filling one's stomach.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Available at the start of the game</color>
